pageContext.claim: “ABC’s Trump In Trouble Poll Surveyed Just 533, Not Likely Voters, Asked Over 20% More Biden Supporters Than Conservatives … Total Fake Poll. ABC is just like the rest of them!”
pageContext.analysis: The ABC/Ipsos poll found Trump's approval rating on the coronavirus at 35 percent, the fourth-straight poll since July in which his approval was around that low level. There's nothing unusual about the poll methodology, all of which was disclosed. Trump says the pollsters surveyed 20 percent "more Biden supporters than conservatives," which is an overblown way of expressing the breakdown of respondents: 31 percent Democrats, 25 percent Republicans and 38 percent independents.
